title: Book Smart vs Street Smart: Uptown Showdown
description: A comedy clash where sharp-witted scholars face off against quick-thinking hustlers. Featuring notable guests like Ariel Dumas and Negin Farsad.

title: CJ Leede’s American Rapture
description: Horror writer CJ Leede celebrates the paperback release of 'American Rapture' with a reading and discussion, followed by a screening of 'Zombieland'.
cost: $15 admission includes a store gift card, $19.99 ticket option includes a signed copy of the book.

title: Brooklyn Books + Booze
description: A monthly event featuring established and up-and-coming authors reading from their works at Barrow's Intense Tasting Room.
address: Barrow's Intense Tasting Room, Industry City

title: Astronomy on Tap: ‘Trick or Treat Telescope’ Edition
description: A night for astronomy enthusiasts with talks by professional scientists and themed games at Pete’s Candy Store, Williamsburg.

title: The Broad Squad
description: A monthly comedy variety show featuring a female-fronted lineup and tarot readings at Young Ethel’s, South Slope.

title: Live Band Karaoke at Arlene’s Grocery
description: Join for live band karaoke with Nakatomi5 backing you up at Arlene’s Grocery, LES.

title: Sweet Comedy Show: ‘Sweet-ween’ Edition
description: Seth Herzog’s comedy show featuring guests like Janeane Garofalo and Adrian Martinez at The Stand West, Chelsea.

title: Hyperfocus: A Neurodivergent Comedy Show
description: A comedy show featuring neurodivergent comedians at Caveat, LES.
